snippet.title: When Pigs Fly Feature Preview - Drone Takedown
snippet.description: Quick video showcasing some upcoming feature  in When Pigs Fly.  I use the new fuel cans, powered hinges, retargetable camera, and explosions to shootdown a low flying drone.  (Yes, I know the drone was about to crash anyway).
